description:
Al Quran MP3 – Full Quran with Audio, Translation, Tafseer, and Offline Access

Experience the complete Holy Quran in one easy-to-use Islamic app, perfect for Ramadan, daily worship, and every Islamic month. Al Quran MP3 offers full Quran Kareem recitation with MP3 audio, translations in over 20 languages, verse-by-verse Tafseer, and offline reading and listening. Whether you are looking to read, listen, or study the Quran, this app is your trusted Islamic companion for everyday spiritual growth.

This all-in-one app also includes essential Islamic tools like accurate prayer times with Azan notifications, a Qibla direction finder, Islamic calendar with Ramadan and Eid dates, a smart Zakat calculator, daily Duas and Hadith, and an AI-powered Islamic assistant to answer your questions.

Key Features of Al Quran MP3 – القرآن الكريم:

1. Read and Listen to the Full Quran Offline

    Complete Quran with Arabic text and 16-line Mushaf PDF

    High-quality MP3 audio recitation by world-renowned Qaris

    Verse-by-verse audio playback for better memorization

    Offline mode for reading and listening without internet access

2. Quran with Translation in 20+ Languages

    Translations in English, Urdu, Hindi, Bengali, French, Turkish, Indonesian, Persian, and more

    Word-by-word translation for deeper understanding

3. Tafseer for In-Depth Understanding

    Verse-by-verse Tafseer to understand the context and meaning

    Ideal for students, scholars, and daily readers

4. Transliteration for Non-Arabic Speakers

    Romanized Arabic text to help with pronunciation and Tajweed

    Great for beginners learning to read the Quran

5. Quran MP3 Player

    Listen to Quran recitation by multiple famous Qaris

    Supports background audio playback and multitasking

6. Qibla Direction Finder

    Accurate Qibla compass to locate the Kaaba from anywhere

    Works offline and globally

7. Accurate Prayer Times and Azan Alerts

    Real-time prayer timings based on your location

    Azan notifications for all five daily prayers

    Supports global prayer time calculation methods (ISNA, MWL, Umm al-Qura)

8. Zakat Calculator

    Automatically calculate your annual Zakat with support for gold, silver, cash, and assets

    Based on Islamic rules to help ensure accurate Zakat giving

9. Islamic Calendar

    Hijri and Gregorian calendar with key Islamic dates

    Includes Ramadan, Eid, Hajj, and other important events

10. Daily Islamic Content for Spiritual Growth

    Daily Dua, Verse, Hadith, and Surah recommendations

    Stay connected with your faith every day

11. AI Mufti – Ask Islamic Questions Instantly

    Get answers to your Islamic questions using AI-powered technology

    Covers Quranic interpretation, Hadith, Islamic rulings, and more

Why Choose Al Quran MP3 – القرآن الكريم?

    Full offline Quran app with audio

    User-friendly interface for all ages

    Customizable reading experience with font size, color themes, and more

    Designed for daily use, Ramadan, Hifz memorization, and all Islamic months

Al Quran MP3 is more than just a Quran reader or audio player – it’s your complete Islamic app for spiritual growth, learning, and daily worship.

Download Al Quran MP3 – القرآن الكريم now and deepen your connection with the Holy Quran.

developer: TABSERA EGITIM HIZMETLERI SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
description:
"Tabsera Quran" is a Quran Learning application with the following Features
Quran pages look like real pages as Quran is in Ottoman font
App contain Somali tafsir (Text + Audio)
App has multiple Quran Reciter
Aya level selection
User can add bookmarks and notes to aya

We offer a unique free offline Bible study tool that you can learn and share the Holy Bible on your own or with your trusted bible study group. Comparing to traditional Holy Bible, our e-bible allows you to access Holy Bible easily on your digital devices without carrying paper book around, listen to Bible verses while driving and running, or take challenges of biblical quizzes and crosswords. 

Our KJV Bible App is a Fast, light, free offline bible for your daily study. It allows you to quickly locate Holy Bible verse with a simple tap and create your own Holy Bible verse highlights, bookmark and verse picture.

Please join our virtual bible study group to explore Bible with more than 10 million people who have downloaded our KJV Holy Bible App worldwide. Get yourself closer to God and listen to God's word at any time by using our pocket Holy Bible App.

----Feature ----

BEST AUDIO FOR BIBLE PLAN
-Various Bible verse audio of King James Version KJV.
-Classic bible plan audio that you can listen to God's word.
-Listen to your favorite Bible verses whenever you are unable to read while driving, running and strolling.
-Let God's word put you to sleep at night.

THE BEST BIBLE STUDY TOOL
-Access to Holy Bible anytime anywhere just by swiping screen.
-Offline Bibles: Read and study Bible verse WITHOUT internet access.
-Search the Bible with keywords.
-Quickly locate verse.
-Share your Bible verse with your friends anytime anywhere with ease.
-Highlight verses you like for future bible study.
-Note your inspirations.
-Have fun with our selected bible quizzes and crosswords challenges.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR FREE BIBLE
-Font adjustment: choose any font size and line spacings you want.
-Night mode: change to night mode when you read the Bible at night.
-Share verses with your friends via social platforms with ease.
-Verses Image: Customize fantastic Bible verse images.

READ BIBLE DAILY
-Connect to God's word with our one-of-a-kind pocket Holy Bible App.
-Fantastic Bible reading experience.
-Use this free Bible for your daily devotional study and Christian Bible reading.
-Read with your religious community and share your thoughts together.

To have access to the Ad-Free Version, you can choose a monthly remove ads subscription. This recurring transaction will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Al Quran - القران الكريم app is an authentic Islamic application that complements the traditional printed Qur'an, providing a variety of features for Listening & Reading Holy Quran for iPhone and iPad users.
تطبيق Al Quran - القران الكريم هو تطبيق إسلامي أصيل يكمّل القرآن المطبوع التقليدي، حيث يوفر مجموعة من الميزات للاستماع وقراءة القران الكريم لمستخدمي آيفون وآيباد.

The Qur'an, revered as the Holy Book of Islam, stands as the ultimate source of guidance and wisdom for all of humanity. In the divine revelation, the Angel Jibril (AS) conveyed Allah's profound words to the revered Prophet Muhammad (صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم) over the course of 23 years, shaping the sacred scripture into its transcendent form.

القرآن، الذي يعتبر كتاب الله المقدس في الإسلام، يقف كمصدر نهائي للهداية والحكمة لكل البشر. في الوحي الإلهي، قام الملك جبريل (عليه السلام) بنقل كلمات الله العميقة إلى النبي المحترم محمد (صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم) على مدى ٢٣ عامًا، صاغًا بذلك كتاب المقدس في شكله السامي.

Al Quran - القران الكريم is a beautiful and inspiring Holy Book, and it is said that the recitation of the Qur'an is one of the most rewarding acts of worship. 
The Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) said, The best among you are those who learn the Qur'an and teach it." (Sahih Bukhari, Hadith number 5029)
 
القران - القران الكريم هو كتاب مقدس جميل وملهم، ويقال أن تلاوة القران من أكثر العبادات مكافأة. 
قال النبي محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم: «خيركم من تعلم القران وعلمه» - (صحيح البخاري، الحديث رقم ٥٠٢٩)
Features:

Experience seamless reading with our app's resume feature for Quran قران readers and reciters. Enjoy crystal-clear HD quality with a 16 line display mirroring the precision of a paper Quran. Unlike traditional paper versions, our app's Arabic Word Zoom feature allows users to read with enhanced accuracy and the ability to zoom in. Our efficient search function, combined with the Go To Page feature, enables users to navigate directly to any Qur'an page, enhancing the overall user experience.

Our Quran Majeed  القران المجيد app also provides the Hijri date, with an available option for hijri date adjustment. You can manually adjust the Hijri date according to your preferences.

Discover our Global Prayer Times Clock, equipped with Azan / Adhan alarms featuring short and long adhan sounds. With support for diverse prayer time calculation methods, the app automatically detects your current location and calculates prayer timings for you. Customize manually as needed.

To cater to the diverse needs of Muslim residing in various countries, our Al Quran - القران الكريم is fully available in local languages such as English, Arabic, Hindi, Indonesian, Urdu, Persian, Turkish, Malay, Malayalam, French, Russian, Uzbek, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, German, Thai, and Bengali. This broad language support is designed to enhance the experience for Muslims across the globe.

Indulge in the melodic recitations of 20+ renowned Quran reciters on Al Quran - القران الكريم app. Seamlessly stream or save audio for offline listening, featuring distinguished voices from World famous reciters

القران الكريم كاملاً دون الاتصال بالانترنت وهو مطابق للمصحف الورقي تماماً مع العديد من الميزات المفيدة.

Want to strengthen your connection with the Quran? Try our Al Quran app, used by over 13 million people worldwide.

Understand the Quran in your language with Tafsir. Listen to recitations and explore word-by-word meanings and grammar. Search, bookmark, take notes, and track your progress for deeper study.

Listen to beautiful recitations by your favourite Qaris, follow along with tajweed, and read from familiar Mushaf pages, all in one app. This app is completely free with no ads!

Let’s explore how this easy-to-use Quran app will help you connect with the Quran more meaningfully.

Translations, Tafsirs and Surah Info
- Understand the Quran by studying 170+ Translations & Tafsirs of the Quran in 60+ languages: English, Indonesian, Bangla, Hindi, Urdu, German, Chinese, French, Italian, Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tamil, and many more!
- 8 Arabic Tafsirs (including Tafseer Ibn Kathir, Tafseer Tabari, etc.) along with Arabic E3rab, Word Meaning, Asbabun Nuzul
- Surah info: Surah summary and virtues

Word by Word Analysis & Translations
- Read Word by Word translations of the Quran in English, Indonesian, Bangla, German, Hindi, Ingush, Malay, Russian, Tamil, Turkish and Urdu
- Study and analyse Word Root/Lemma, Grammar, Morphology, Occurrences in different forms and Verb Forms to dive in more depth. Helpful to learn & understand Quranic Arabic

Mushaf Mode
- Recite Quran in Mushaf mode to have the same experience when reciting from a hard-copy Mushaf
- Available Mushaf scripts: Madani, Naskh Indopak, Qaloon, Shemerly, Warsh

Library: Bookmarks & Notes
- Bookmark ayahs to your own Collections and keep track of the last read ayah using Pins
- Start reading from where you left off using auto Last Reads
- Reflect and take notes for each ayah (آية)
- Sync library across multiple devices and even share with others using import/export

Search & Quran Subject-wise Topics
- Powerful Search with highlights to quickly find what you are looking for
- Explore by Topics & read the ayahs related to a topic together

Quran Audio
- Listen to Quran recitations by 80+ reciters with Quran audio translation in 10+ languages (downloadable for offline use)
- Reciter Options: Mishary Al Afasy, Husary, Ayman Suwaid, Abdur Rahman As-Sudais and many others
- Powerful Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorisation/Quran Hifz
- Reciters tagged based on recitation types: Murattal, Mujawwad, Translation
- Arabic Audio Commentary and Quran audio translation in Bangla, English, Urdu others

Quran Planner, Streak and Badges
- Plan your Khatmah of the Quran using the Quran Planner
- Set your daily reading target, track and increase it gradually
- Monitor your weekly activity
- Build a daily Quran reading habit using Streak
- Earn badges for completing Streak Milestones and exploring app features

Various Customisation Options, Tajweed & Others
- Read in Uthmanic or Indopak script
- Read Tafsirs in Tafsir view
- Recite Tajweed colour-coded Quran with ease
- Quran Dictionary: See the list of roots for different Arabic alphabets
- Various fonts and multiple themes, including Night mode
- Autoscroll feature
- Copy & Share the verses
- All feature supports offline (Quran offline)

15+ Languages
- Arabic, English, Bangla, German, French, Bahasa Indonesia / Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Turkish, Urdu, and more

Download the ad-free Quran app and start your journey to a deeper understanding of the Quran!

Share and recommend this beautiful app to your friends and family. May Allah bless us in this world and the hereafter.

Allah’s Messenger (pbuh) said: "Whoever calls people to right guidance will have a reward like that of those who follow him..." [Sahih Muslim: 2674]

No one to recite to? No problem. Tarteel AI is here!

How many times have you wished you knew more surahs to use in salah? That you could get feedback on your recitation whenever you needed it? That you could memorize more, and worry less?

Hide. Tap. Recite. In three easy moves, you’re strengthening your memorization of the Quran with the world’s leading AI Quran memorization companion. Simply hide the verses, tap the mic and start reciting. The pages will fill with your recitation and if you make a mistake, Tarteel’s intuitive AI will be sure let you know INSTANTLY with its flagship feature, Memorization Mistake Detection. That’s live feedback on your recitation, any time, anywhere - even if you whisper! 

Whether you’re memorizing for your next Hifz class or revising Juz Amma on your daily commute, Tarteel adapts to your recitation, tracks your progress and aligns with your goals. It’s your companion —helping you memorize better, build confidence, and create a Quran habit that lasts a lifetime. No matter where you are in your memorization, Tarteel is here for the journey. 

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team operates within the framework of Ihsan, striving for excellence and using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Supercharge your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Try it now for FREE, no credit card required. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we know there’s community demand and it’s on our roadmap for the future!

- Hidden Verses

Hide the verses and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Goals

Set custom Goals for what you want to memorize and revise. Choose your portion, deadline and the type of engagement you want; memorization, reading, revision or recitation!

- Historical Mistakes

Progress is key! Tarteel keeps a record of all of your mistakes so you know exactly where your memorization is strong and what could use a little more work. 

- Unlimited Listening and Audio

Solidify your memorization with listening and audio! Choose your favourite Qari, the portion and how many times you want to listen. 

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement. 

—

Join the 9M+ Muslims worldwide who are using Tarteel to support their memorization of the Quran!

Do you use Tarteel? Your feedback helps us improve the platform and add to our long-term roadmap. If you’ve benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review - we’d love to hear from you! Request new features here: [http://feedback.tarteel.ai](http://feedback.tarteel.ai/)

—

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please ensure you allow Tarteel to access these permissions on your device.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/terms/

Holy Quran Recitation with Sheikh Abdul Rehman Al Sudais Complete Audio (Works Offline, no internet required after installation)

Surah Listing additionally open from any ayah

Discover the "Holy Bible" App - Your Gateway to Spiritual Growth
Embark on a transformative faith journey with the "Holy Bible" app, a powerful companion designed to uplift and inspire. Immerse yourself in endless possibilities as you explore captivating features to enhance your spiritual experience. From engaging Bible study sessions to enlightening conversations with an AI priest, from exhilarating trivia quizzes to serene moments of prayer, "Holy Bible" is the ultimate app for every devout believer.
Unlock the Power of Prayer
Experience a profound connection with the divine through the app's immersive prayer platform. Engage in morning and night prayers with carefully curated verses and uplifting prayers that resonate with your heart's desires. Connect with God anytime, anywhere, and express your thoughts and aspirations.
Elevate Your Bible Reading
Immerse yourself in the wisdom of the Bible with the personalized reading experience. Tailor your journey to suit your preferences by creating notes, highlights, and bookmarks. Whether you're at the gym or enjoying a moment of tranquility, listen to Bible audios to enrich your understanding. With offline access, delve into scriptures without relying on a network connection.
Enlightenment With AI Priest
Engage with your AI priest through the app. Seamlessly blend technology with spirituality as you receive invaluable guidance and answers to your deepest questions. This feature facilitates Bible study and supports clarity on your spiritual path.
Ignite Your Mind with Bible Quiz
Stimulate your intellect and relax your soul with Bible trivia quizzes. Whether you seek a momentary escape or a brain-teasing challenge, the app offers an array of quizzes to test your knowledge while providing a well-deserved respite. Unwind, recharge, and deepen your connection to the Word in an interactive way.
Embrace Guided Study Plans
Cultivate a consistent study and prayer routine with the comprehensive plans. Choose from themed study plans for personal growth. Receive reminders and notifications to nourish your soul with divine wisdom.
Immerse Yourself in Bible Jigsaw
Experience the beauty of churches around the world through captivating Bible quiz games and activities. Collect jigsaw pieces, unlocking stunning views of churches. Let the splendor of these images further enrich your spiritual exploration.
Record Your Journey With God
Capture the essence of your spiritual odyssey using the app. Document your interactions with God, cherishing every moment spent seeking His heart and communicating through prayer. Witness the transformative power of devotion.
Key Features:
- Personalize prayer experience and communicate directly with God.
- Engage in insightful conversations with your AI priest, exploring biblical knowledge.
- Test your learning and deepen understanding with engaging Bible quizzes.
- Foster a commitment to study and personal growth with supportive features.
- Share impactful verses with friends and loved ones effortlessly.
- Create visually stunning scripture-sharing images.
- Develop a daily habit of study and prayer through the habit-forming function.
- Immerse yourself in personalized reading experiences, choosing fonts, backgrounds, and generating personalized notes.
- Experience the Bible come to life with the audio version, perfect for moments of relaxation or exercise.
- Embark on theme-based study plans, deepening understanding.
- Track your spiritual growth, celebrating progress.

From the makers of Quran.com comes Quran for iOS, a beautiful, and ad-free mushaf app. 

It’s now easier to read the Quran on the go, memorize it and listen to your favorite reciters.

This is just the beginning for Quran for iOS. We’ll be updating the app regularly insha'Allah and would love to hear your feedback and feature requests. You can reach us at ios@quran.com

As the Hadeeth (prophetic statement) in At-Tirmithi states: “Whoever reads a letter from the Book of Allah, he will have a reward, and this reward will be multiplied by ten. I am not saying that 'Alif, Laam, Meem' (a combination of letters frequently mentioned in the Holy Quran) is a letter, rather I am saying that ‘Alif’ is a letter, ‘Laam’ is a letter and ‘Meem’ is a letter.” [At-Tirmithi] We hope this app will help you increase your recitation of the Quran and increase your blessings in this world and the hereafter. 


من صناع Quran.com يأتي تطبيق القرآن للأجهزة المحمولة، تطبيق للمصحف ذو صفحات جميلة خالي تماما من الاعلانات.

لقد أصبح من السهل قراءة القرآن بالشارع، وحفظه، والاستماع إلى قارئك المفضل.

هذا هو مجرد بداية لتطبيق القرآن. سنعمل على تحديث التطبيق بشكل منتظم إن شاء الله، ونحب أن نسمع رأيك ومتطلبتك. يمكنك الوصول إلينا عن طريق البريد الإلكتروني ios@quran.com

عَنْ ابْنِ مَسْعُودٍ قَالَ : قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ { مَنْ قَرَأَ حَرْفًا مِنْ كِتَابِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُ حَسَنَةٌ وَالْحَسَنَةُ بِعَشْرِ أَمْثَالِهَا, لَا أَقُولُ الم حَرْفٌ, وَلَكِنْ أَلِفٌ حَرْفٌ, وَلَامٌ حَرْفٌ,وَمِيمٌ حَرْفٌ }. رَوَاهُ التِّرْمِذِيُّ. ونحن نأمل أن يساعدك هذا التطبيق على زيادة قراءتك للقرآن وزيادة حسناتك في الدنيا والآخرة.

Bible for Women
Bright and beautiful Bible with day and night mode designed specifically for women 
 
Daily Devotionals
Morning and Evening daily devotionals by C. H. Spurgeon
 
Verses of the day
Daily verses from all books of the Bible, Psalms and Gospels

Daily reading plans
Canonical, historical and chronological reading plans for one Year, 180 and 90 Days.

Audio Bible
Works offline, voice can be tuned by speed, height and pronouncement

Bookmarks, Notes and Highlight
Save your bookmarks, notes, highlights and synchronize them between different devices in your apple account via iCloud

Smart, Agile and Offline
Fast search, simultaneous works with multiple verses, text and audio customization, flipping pages option -- all works offline

User Friendly
Easy to to use, day and night modes, interface rotation, fast navigation, configurable notifications for daily reading

app_name: Manual for Microsoft Excel with Tips and Tricks
description:
This audio guide will teach you in an interactive way to work easy and efficient with Excel 2010.

Microsoft Excel is a powerful office calculation program which thousands use on a daily basis.
Are you a beginner or do you use it frequently but still have questions regarding a specific move/essential trick?

As a matter of fact, the very best selection of tutorials are provided here.
After using our guide there won’t be left much you won’t be able to do self-confidently in Excel, since it’s been under research and development by an expert dev team.

Key features of this manual: 
1.	How to work with Basic Features in Excel
2.	How to Create a worksheet and copy paste in Excel
3.	How to Change and Add an Excel Worksheet
4.	How to Create multiple custom Worksheet views in Excel
5.	How to set Options in Excel
6.	How to Navigate in an Excel workbook
7.	How to Navigate through shortcuts in Excel
8.	How to Find the commands you need and use Backstage view or the File tab in Excel
9.	How to Customize the ribbon bar in Excel
10.	How to Customize your display of Status Bar totals in Excel
11.	How to work with data using shortcuts in Excel
12.	How to Understand formulas and functions in Excel
13.	How to work with times and dates in Excel 2010
14.	How to Format numbers and dates in Excel 2010
15.	How to apply fonts, background colors, and borders in Excel 2010
16.	How to add Background Color automatically in Excel
17.	How to apply, create and share styles in Excel 2010
18.	How to adjust columns, rows and text in Excel 2010
19.	How to use custom conditional formatting in Excel 2010
20.	How to coordinate a look using themes in Excel 2010
21.	How to split screen and Freeze Cells in Excel
22.	How to insert headers and footers in Excel 2010
23.	How to Add pictures and shapes in Excel 2010
24.	How to Insert SmartArt in Excel 2010
25.	How to alphabetize in Excel
26.	How to Use tables to sort and filter data in Excel
27.	How to know Basic and multi-field sorting in Excel
28.	How to control cell cursor in Excel
29.	How to Select Multiple Cells in Excel
30.	How to Target large data groups in Excel
31.	How to Name and use cell ranges in Excel 2010
32.	How to Convert Excel 2010 vertical cells to horizontal
33.	How to Record and using a simple macro in Excel
34.	How to Create a basic PivotTable in Excel
35.	How to Use templates in Excel 2010
36.	How to Create Templates in Excel
37.	How to Hide or group rows and columns in Excel
38.	How to Hide and Unhide Worksheet in Excel
39.	How to Make Excel 2010 formulas invisible or visible
40.	How to Write subscript in Excel 2010
41.	How to Create a Drop Down Menu in Excel
42.	How to Insert Check Mark Symbol in Excel
43.	How to Use Symbols and Special Characters in Excel
44.	How to Insert and edit comments in Excel
45.	How to maintain Excel Compatibility
46.	How to Save Excel 2010 as read only
47.	How to Convert an Excel 2010 spreadsheet to a word document
48.	How to Convert Excel 2010 to a jpeg format
49.	How to Export Excel 2010 data to a text file
50.	How to Export Excel 2010 to fixed width text file

52.	How to Adjust Excel 2010 print area
53.	How to Copy Excel 2010 sheet into email
54.	How to Open an Excel Spreadsheet Online
55.	How to Share a workbook and track changes in Excel
56.	How to start Excel 2010 in safe mode 2010

Read Comics, Manga, Webtoons, Manhwa & Manhua And More
- All the hottest comics are right here! You can read all kinds of comics, including Fantasy, Action, Romance, Horror, BL Manga (Boy’s Love), and more.
- We have manhwa and webtoon stories from Korea. We provide manhwa & webtoon fans with various genres of wonderful work.
- There also are manhua stories for you to read. You can find the latest and hottest manhua stories in different genres on MangaToon. Tales of Demons and Gods, Bossy President, Battle Through the Heavens and more iconic manhua arewaits you to read!

Read Free Comics
- At MangaToon, many of our comics require paying a unlocking fee to read. The reason is that manga creators also need to make a living. Only with manga fans' support, they can continue to create better comic storiess. Your support is the best motivation for them to create mangas.
- But MangaToon also provides plenty of free ways for readers to read manga for free. Every week, there are different comics released for manga readers to read for free.
- Also, You can get free comics, unlock them with points or reading vouchers. By completing platform tasks, you will receive a certain number of points and reading vouchers every week, which allows you get free comics.
- Even if you don't have points or manga vouches, you can still read free comics by watching a short video to unlock manga chapters.

Great Manga Reading Experience
- At MangaToon, you can not only read comics online but also download them for offline reading, allowing you to enjoy the fascinating world of manga anytime and anywhere.
- MangaToon is a manga reader designed specifically for mobile phone reading. You can scroll mangas & webtoons smoothly for an uninterrupted reading experience.
- We provide colorful manga and comic works on MangaToon, bring you a more immersive comic reading experience.
- Join our manga community and discuss everything about your favorite manga with millions of manga lovers!
- A vertical search tool for comics. You can search and read mangas like One Piece, Jujutsu Kaisen, Naruto and other hottest mangas.
- Pad version is also supported. Enjoy manga with a better screen on your pad!
- As a manga reader designed for manga fans all over the world, you can find mangas and stories in more than ten languages, including English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Indonesian Vietnamese and Thai. You can switch to other languages on the App's settings page to read comic stories.

Tell stories like chatting
- At MangaToon, in addition to reading comics, you can also find many exciting chat stories. Chat stories are a new form of novel where the story unfolds in the form of chatting. Chat stories have exciting plotlines, the world views full of imagination, and a more relaxed reading experience, allowing you to read stories as easily as chatting with a friend.
- A vast array of wonderful stories awaits you to discover, where you can see characters from One Piece chatting with each other, fanfiction stories about the personal stories of BTS members, and so on.

Давайте знакомиться, мы — Читай-город! В нашем приложении, которое связывает интернет-магазин и более 500 книжных по всей стране, можно:

– Покупать книги, сувениры, канцелярию себе или в подарок. Можно воспользоваться услугой «Забрать за 1 час», выбрав самый удобный для вас способ получения. Или оформить экспресс-доставку — чтобы получить заветный томик скорее.

– Делать предзаказы на новинки. Многие из них есть только у нас, причём с эксклюзивными подарками!

– Получать рекомендации через сервис «Я в магазине». Выберите Читай-город, в котором находитесь, и мы покажем его новинки и топы — указав стеллаж и полку. Или введите название книги, которая интересует, чтобы узнать, где она стоит. Ещё можем посоветовать вам историю почти по любому запросу. Например, что-то о котиках ;)

– Быстро узнавать об акциях, скидках, получать и тратить бонусы.

– Выбирать книги на основе наших статей и советов от искусственного интеллекта CHIT-Ai. Он проанализирует, чем интересовались, и предложит истории специально для вас! 

– Купить электронный сертификат, который можно использовать и у нас в магазинах, и точно угадать с подарком — есть варианты в разных номиналах и дизайнах. Можем даже подсказать с пожеланием.

Программа лояльности Книголов

Книголов — единая программа лояльности Читай-города, Буквоеда, book24.ruи Литрес. С ней  вы сможете копить бонусы и оплачивать ими до 100% от стоимости покупки.

Фишки программы лояльности:

– Подарки для новых участников: 50 бонусов за регистрацию на кассе и 50 бонусов за подписку на рассылки. 

– Кешбэк до 15% за покупки. Чем больше покупаете – тем выше кешбэк. А для клиентов с Литрес Подпиской он специальный, целых 20%!

– Единый счёт: копите и тратьте бонусы на сайте, в приложении или в магазинах нашей сети, а ещё в Буквоеде, Литрес, Гоголь-Моголе и на сайте book24.ru.

– Простые условия: 1 бонус = 1 рубль. Бонусами можно оплатить до 100% от стоимости покупок.

– Секретные скидки и другие предложения для владельцев бонусной карты. 

– Бонусы в подарок: 100 в день рождения, до 30 за отзывы на сайте и не только.

Чтобы стать участником программы лояльности, зарегистрируйтесь в приложении и разрешите выпуск карты. Это займёт всего пару минут :)

Доставка

Получайте заказ любым удобным способом — курьером, Почтой России, в одном из наших магазинов или в пункте самовывоза. Доставка действует по всей стране.

– Бесплатная доставка в магазины Читай-города и партнёрской сети Буквоед.

– Более 1000 пунктов самовывоза по всей России.

– Курьерская экспресс-доставка по адресу всего за несколько часов.

– Бесплатная курьерская доставка при заказе от 2000 рублей.

– Доставка в подарок другому человеку – возможна, даже если вы не знаете адреса. Об упаковке тоже позаботимся!

В общем, у нас много фишек. А ведь это ещё не все ;) Скачивайте приложение и проверяйте сами!

[Subscription Agreement]
1. Service Name: Week Subscription
2. Subscription Period: 1 week
3. Subscription Price: $9.99 (1 week) 
4. Subscription Benefits: subscribers can claim 60 coins every day
5. Buying a weekly subscription service will automatically debit your iTunes account and extend the service period of one week 24 hours before the week service expires.
6. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iOS "Settings" --> enter "iTunes Store and App Store"
-> click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" ", choose Week Subscription to unsubscribe. If you do not unsubscribe at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

Embark on your spiritual journey with the Ultimate Umrah Guide, an app meticulously crafted to enhance your Umrah experience. Tailored for individuals seeking comprehensive guidance, this app seamlessly combines a concise Umrah guide with authentic dua examples to accompany you at every step.

Duas for Every Step: Explore a rich collection of meticulously curated dua examples to recite at each stage of your Umrah journey. Enhance your connection with the divine through meaningful prayers.

Voice Transcription: Immerse yourself in the spirituality of Umrah with voice/audio transcriptions of all the provided duas. Listen and follow along as you perform each ritual, fostering a deeper connection with your faith.

English Translation: Understand the profound meanings behind the duas with accurate English translations. Gain insights into the spiritual significance of each prayer, fostering a deeper understanding of the rituals.

Multilingual Support: Connect with the divine in your preferred language. Our app is available in multiple languages, ensuring that every user can experience the spiritual journey of Umrah in a language that resonates with them.

Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy an uninterrupted and immersive spiritual experience with our ad-free platform. Your focus should be on the sacred rituals of Umrah, and we ensure a distraction-free environment for your spiritual growth.

Free to Download: Access the complete Umrah guide, dua collection, and all the app features without any cost. We believe in making this spiritual resource freely available to all, fostering inclusivity and accessibility.

Download Now and Begin Your Sacred Journey!

The Ultimate Umrah Guide is designed to be your steadfast companion on this sacred pilgrimage. Download now to access a wealth of knowledge, dua examples, and spiritual guidance. Experience the beauty of Umrah with a user-friendly app that is not only ad-free but also available in multiple languages. May your journey be blessed and spiritually enriching.

Descubra o poder da Palavra de Deus no seu dia a dia com o Bíblia Sagrada e Devocional diário do Bíbliaon, o aplicativo perfeito para quem busca fortalecer a fé, encontrar paz e receber mensagens edificantes com base na Bíblia sagrada. O App do Bíbliaon oferece a Bíblia para que você a possa ler ou ouvir, e não só, a cada dia você recebe um novo versículo e um devocional especialmente selecionado para abençoar a sua jornada espiritual. Tudo isto disponível também em áudio para você ouvir onde e quando quiser.

O nosso conteúdo é criado com dedicação por pessoas de fé, especialistas em Bíblia e membros da comunidade evangélica, com a missão de explicar as palavras das Escrituras de forma prática, envolvente e inspiradora, trazendo a mensagem bíblica para a linguagem e os desafios do dia a dia, fortalecendo o teu crescimento espiritual em cada leitura.

Este app tem transformado vidas e ajudado milhares de pessoas a encontrarem momentos de paz e reflexão no meio da correria do dia a dia. Agora é a sua vez de experimentar essa bênção!

COMO O APP VAI TE ABENÇOAR
- Leitura da Bíblia: aceda à versão NVI da Bíblia quando e onde quiser
- Versículo do Dia: receba um versículo inspirado diretamente no seu celular para guiar seu coração.
- Devocional Diário: reflexões profundas para aplicar a Palavra de Deus no seu cotidiano.
- Áudio: Devocionais e Bíblia em áudio para acompanhar em todos os momentos da sua vida. Voz do narrador personalizável entre feminina ou masculina.
- Histórico: acesse os versículos e devocionais recentes sempre que precisar.
- Compartilhamento: compartilhe os conteúdos que mais te abençoam com quem você mais gosta
- Notificações personalizadas: configure alertas para nunca mais esquecer seu momento de oração e meditação.
- Navegação intuitiva: design simples e prático, pensado para facilitar sua experiência.
- Grátis e acessível: aproveite todos os recursos sem custo, fortalecendo sua fé de maneira acessível.


UMA ROTINA ESPIRITUAL MAIS RICA E SIGNIFICATIVA
Seja ao acordar, no intervalo do trabalho, ou antes de dormir, o Bíblia e Devocional do Bíbliaon permite que você tenha sempre um momento especial com Deus. Com versículos poderosos, mensagens de fé e palavras de encorajamento, você se sentirá mais próximo de Deus.

POR QUE ESCOLHER O BÍBLIA E DEVOCIONAL DIÁRIO DO BÍBLIAON?
- Praticidade: acesso rápido e fácil aos conteúdos.
- Palavra de Deus a qualquer hora: esteja sempre conectado à Bíblia.
- Oração e meditação diárias: estabeleça um hábito de comunhão com Deus.
- Abençoe sua vida e a de outros: compartilhe mensagens inspiradoras com amigos e familiares.


INTEGRAÇÃO COM SUA VIDA ESPIRITUAL
O aplicativo Bíblia e Devocional Diário do Bíbliaon é ideal para quem busca um aliado na sua rotina espiritual, momentos de adoração, fortalecimento da fé e um relacionamento mais profundo com Deus através da Bíblia Sagrada. Quer você busque um versículo diário na versão NVI, ou precise de um guia de oração e meditação, este aplicativo foi feito para você!


BAIXE AGORA MESMO
Junte-se a milhares de pessoas que já fazem do Bíblia e Devocional diário do Bíbliaon o seu companheiro de fé. Baixe grátis agora mesmo e leve a Palavra de Deus com você todos os dias!


Termos de Utilização: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ 
Política de Privacidade: https://www.bibliaon.com/privacidade/ 


#bíblia #oração #versículos #bible #diário #grátis #meditação #palavra #adoração #inspiração #audio #app

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:
- Subscribe to Wattpad Premium for uninterrupted ads-free reading and first access to new features
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of the chosen package
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- For full terms of service, visit https://www.wattpad.com/terms
- For our privacy policy, visit https://www.wattpad.com/privacy
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Brought to you by Fetyaton Amanou and Designed & Developed by Massyve.tech, a beautiful and ad-free Holy Quran application with the latest available mobile technologies. The app is specially designed to both display and provide audio for the Holy Quran and its explanation by Sayid Abbas Ali Al Mousawi in a simple and interactive way.
We hope this app will increase your blessings in this world and the hereafter. We will be working on updating the app regularly and would love to hear your feedback and feature requests. You can reach us at support@massyve.tech

Key Features:
1- Browse by Soura & Juz'.
2- Listen to your favorite reciter from the wide variety of world famous reciters.
3- Read or listen to 3 different Quran explanations (أوضح البيان في تفسير القرآن للسيد عباس علي الموسوي, تفسير الميزان للسيد الطباطبائي, تفسير الأمثل الشيخ ناصر مكارم الشيرازي).
4- View "لفتة" for special golden verses.
5- Click on any green keyword to view its meaning.
6- View all keywords meanings for each a page.
7- Worldwide daily prayer times and notifications with full customization to your preference.
8- View Hijri time
9- Advanced search feature that can help you search for any word in different forms (الرحمن الرحيم, الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ, Allah), with instant auto search and the ability to search in the Quran explanations.
10- Scroll easily between pages, juz' or souwar.
11- Receive a random verse from the Holy Quran everyday that contains a "لفتة".
12- Bookmark and save your favorite pages or verses.
13- Verse highlighting during Quran recitation.
14- Copy or share one or multiple verse(s) from the Holy Quran or any tafseer.
15- Switch easily between tafseer and another.
16- Pinch to zoom and increase the font size.
